Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; RELIEF
Name: Terracotta of Harpocrates
Description: Terracotta figurine of which only the upper part is preserved. It represents Harpocrates, with the index finger of his right hand to the lips and supporting up the horn of plenty with his left arm.
